author: parithosh
content:
Steps:
- You'd need to 0 all the fork blocks, so its ready at genesis (both on EL and CL fronts) 
- Set TTD as 0 in both EL and CL genesis configs
- Make sure the deposit contract is present in the EL genesis state
- Create the CL genesis with the following command:
```
eth2-testnet-genesis merge --config=/cl-config.yaml --mnemonics=/mnemonics.yaml --eth1-config=/el-config.json --tranches-dir=/tranches (output to store pubkeys) --state-output=/genesis.ssz (output merged genesis state)
```

This genesis.ssz should then work, you'll have a testnet that starts from a merged state (Tested on lighthouse, lodestar and teku).

WIP PR to upgrade kurtosis to support merged genesis as a default: https://github.com/kurtosis-tech/eth2-merge-kurtosis-module/pull/137

I'll make a similar PR in the genesis-generator, so we can have PoW genesis only as an optional flag
